title: Data Schema for sanitation fractions
description: This schema defines the properties for sanitation fractions that summarise the sanitation situation at a given geographical area.

fields.name: gid
fields.title: GADM ID for country/subarea
fields.description: The GID starts with the three letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 country code. If there are subdivisions these are identified by a number from 1 to n.

fields.name: flushSewer_urb
fields.title: Flush toilets (sewered) - urban
fields.description: Fraction of people connected to flush sewer in urban areas.

fields.name: flushSeptic_urb
fields.title: Flushed septic tanks - urban
fields.description: Fraction of people using flush septic tanks in rural areas.

fields.name: flushPit_urb
fields.title: Flush pits - urban
fields.description: Fraction of people using flush pit sanitation in urban areas.

fields.name: flushOpen_urb
fields.title: Flushed Open - urban
fields.description: Fraction of people using flush open sanitation in urban areas

fields.name: flushUnknown_urb
fields.title: Flush Unknown - urban
fields.description: Fraction of people using flush to unknown place in urban areas.

fields.name: pitSlab_urb
fields.title: Pit slabs - urban
fields.description: Fraction of people using pits with slab sanitation in urban areas.

fields.name: pitNoSlab_urb
fields.title: Pits (no slabs) - urban
fields.description: Fraction of people using open pit sanitation in urban areas.

fields.name: bucketLatrine_urb
fields.title: Bucket Latrines - urban
fields.description: Fraction of people using bucket latrines in urban areas

fields.name: hangingToilet_urb
fields.title: Hanging toilets - urban
fields.description: Fraction of people using hanging toilets/latrines in urban areas

fields.name: openDefecation_urb
fields.title: Open Defecation - urban
fields.description: Fraction of people using open defecation sanitation in urban areas

fields.name: containerBased_urb
fields.title: Container Based - urban
fields.description: Fraction of people using container based sanitation in urban areas

fields.name: compostingToilet_urb
fields.title: Composting Toilets - urban
fields.description: Fraction of people using composting toilets in urban areas.

fields.name: other_urb
fields.title: Other - urban
fields.description: Fraction of people using other sanitation type in urban areas.

fields.name: sewageTreated_urb
fields.title: Sewage treated - urban
fields.description: Fraction the sewerage system which will have waste water treatment in urban areas.

fields.name: fecalSludgeTreated_urb
fields.title: Fecal Sludge treated - urban
fields.description: Fraction the fecal sludge which will have treatment in urban areas.

fields.name: onsiteDumpedland_urb
fields.title: Onsite Dumpled land - urban
fields.description: fraction of fecal sludge which is dumped on land in urban areas.
